ClassDecl.Name: GuiApplication
ClassDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Represents an GacUI application, for window management and asynchronized operation supporting. Use <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::GetApplication()@s:vl.presentation.controls.GetApplication" /></links> to access the instance of this class.</summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: Run
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Run a <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::GuiWindow@s:vl.presentation.controls.GuiWindow" /></links> as the main window and show it. This function can only be called once in the entry point. When the main window is closed or hiden, the Run function will finished, and the application should prepare for finalization.</summary> <param name="_mainWindow">The main window.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetWindows
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get all created <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::GuiWindow@s:vl.presentation.controls.GuiWindow" /></links> instances. This contains normal windows, popup windows, menus, or other types of windows that inherits from <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::GuiWindow@s:vl.presentation.controls.GuiWindow" /></links>.</summary> <returns>All created <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::GuiWindow@s:vl.presentation.controls.GuiWindow" /></links> instances.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetWindow
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::GuiWindow@s:vl.presentation.controls.GuiWindow" /></links> instance that the mouse cursor are directly in.</summary> <returns>The <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::GuiWindow@s:vl.presentation.controls.GuiWindow" /></links> instance that the mouse cursor are directly in.</returns> <param name="location">The mouse cursor.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: ShowTooltip
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Show a tooltip.</summary> <param name="owner">The control that owns this tooltip temporary.</param> <param name="tooltip">The control as the tooltip content. This control is not owned by the tooltip. User should manually release this control if no longer needed (usually when the application exit).</param> <param name="preferredContentWidth">The preferred content width for this tooltip.</param> <param name="location">The relative location to specify the left-top position of the tooltip.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetTooltipOwner
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the tooltip owner. When the tooltip closed, it returns null.</summary> <returns>The tooltip owner.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetExecutablePath
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the file path of the current executable.</summary> <returns>The file path of the current executable.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetExecutableFolder
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the folder of the current executable.</summary> <returns>The folder of the current executable.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: IsInMainThread
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Test is the current thread the main thread for GUI.</summary> <returns>Returns true if the current thread is the main thread for GUI.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: InvokeAsync
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Invoke a specified function asynchronously.</summary> <param name="proc">The specified function.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: InvokeInMainThread
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Invoke a specified function in the main thread.</summary> <param name="proc">The specified function.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: InvokeInMainThreadAndWait
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Invoke a specified function in the main thread and wait for the function to complete or timeout.</summary> <returns>Return true if the function complete. Return false if the function has not completed during a specified period of time.</returns> <param name="proc">The specified function.</param> <param name="milliseconds">The specified period of time to wait. Set to -1 (default value) to wait forever until the function completed.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: DelayExecute
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Delay execute a specified function with an specified argument asynchronisly.</summary> <returns>The Delay execution controller for this task.</returns> <param name="proc">The specified function.</param> <param name="milliseconds">Time to delay.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: DelayExecuteInMainThread
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Delay execute a specified function with an specified argument in the main thread.</summary> <returns>The Delay execution controller for this task.</returns> <param name="proc">The specified function.</param> <param name="milliseconds">Time to delay.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: RunGuiTask
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Run the specified function in the main thread. If the caller is in the main thread, then run the specified function directly.</summary> <param name="proc">The specified function.</param> </Document>
